page.title: 18Gt.Harrowden Church Finedon
page.content: All Saints Church at Gt.Harrowden is 600 years old and has many interesting features.It stands at the side of the main road and has four pinnacles on the tower. The church has a doom painting showing Hell and Heaven.It was for people who couldn't read.At the back of the church there are the Ten Commandments.In the vestry there is a bone hole where they put old bones dug up in the graveyard. The church organ is 100 years old and has only half the footpedals it is supposed to have.Behind the altar are two brasses of William Harrowden,his wife and pets.In the church a huge curtain divides the church in two because the congregation has become smaller.
